sections.title: How the referral program works
content: Every time someone signs up through your link and installs a featured game, you earn €1.00 as a reward.
Your friend will instantly receive €4.55 as a welcome bonus, with no deposit required.
You’ll also get an extra €5.00 when your referral completes their first withdrawal (minimum €20 for the first withdrawal, no limits after that).

sections.title: What’s required to get the bonuses
content: Bonuses apply only to new, real users who register using your personal link.
To activate the bonus, the friend must complete a game featured on the platform.
The account must be properly verified, and the user must be located in a supported country.

sections.title: A few important notes
content: Bonuses are usually credited within 24–48 hours after completing the required steps.
All payments are manually verified by the Freecash team.
Reward amounts and availability may vary slightly depending on the user’s country.
Bonuses are real money and can be withdrawn without any fees.
Freecash reserves the right to change the terms of the program at any time.
